text: Ide (hajj)! Mariyu evadaite allah vidhincina nisedhalanu (pavitra niyamanalanu) adaristado, adi atani koraku, atani prabhuvu vadda ento melainadi. Mariyu mi koraku idi varaku miku (nisid'dhamani) ceppa badinavi tappa, itara pasuvulanni dharma sam'matam ceyabaddayi. Ika miru vigraharadhana vanti malin'yam nundi duranga undandi mariyu abad'dhapu (butakapu) matala nundi kuda duranga undandi
